description:
Exciting Opportunity for Assistant Brand Manager Role in Skincare Industry

Summary

Join our dynamic team as an Assistant Brand Manager focusing on digital marketing, social media, website operations, influencers, and eCommerce for a renowned skincare brand. Drive marketing strategies to enhance brand recognition, engage target audiences, and increase sales during this rewarding 12-month contract role based in Los Angeles, CA.

Responsibilities

  • Analyze market trends to capitalize on opportunities and mitigate threats.
  • Collaborate with teams to align product development with market trends.
  • Lead new product concepts from ideation to launch.
  • Develop pricing strategies for revenue maximization.
  • Use data analysis to optimize product performance.
  • Maintain project timelines for product launches.
  • Coordinate with international Original Design Manufacturers (ODMs) for effective communication.
  • Create compelling marketing materials and product descriptions.
  • Collaborate with various teams to create engaging content for the target audience.

Qualifications

  • 2+ years of experience in Skincare products.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.
  • Excellent project and time management skills.
  • Passion for Makeup industry and trends.
  • Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or related field.

Employment Type: Contractor
